official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to extend the hours in which 14 and 15 year old employees may work.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to declare it is not oppressive child labor for fourteen and fifteen-year-old employees to work outside of school hours within certain geographical boundaries for up to 30 hours a week and up to five hours a day until 11:00 p.m.
